text: 2006 floods could refer to a number of flooding incidents in 2006: *Mid- Atlantic United States flood of 2006 *2006 European floods *2006-07 Southeast Asian floods *2006-2007 Malaysian floods *2006 North Korea flooding *Southwest floods of 2006 See also *Weather in 2006 for an overview *List of notable floods *Floods in the United States: 2001-present
title: 2006 floods
